mapper.delete: delete from t_knowledgeshare where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and reviewstatus = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_knowledgeshare (id, title, author, publishdate, reviewstatus, reviewer, reviewdate, goodnum, badnum, summary, content,pageview) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reviewstatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{reviewer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goodnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{badnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},#{pageview,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_knowledgeshare set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publishdate = #{publishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, summary= #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and reviewstatus = 0
mapper.select: select id, title, author, publishdate, reviewstatus, reviewer, reviewdate,reviewComment, goodnum, badnum, content,pageview from t_knowledgeshare where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT count(*) FROM t_knowledgeshare t WHERE t.title=#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT tmp_t.id, tmp_t.title, tmp_t.publishdate, tmp_t.reviewstatus, tmp_t.reviewer, tmp_t.reviewdate,tmp_t.reviewComment,tmp_t.goodnum, tmp_t.badnum, tmp_t.content,tmp_t.pageview,tmp_t.cmtCount, usr.realname as author, (SELECT CONCAT(id,'|',title) FROM t_knowledgeshare WHERE reviewstatus=1 and publishdate > tmp_t.publishdate
ORDER BY goodnum DESC, (goodnum/(goodnum+badnum)) DESC ORDER BY publishdate DESC
LIMIT 1) as `front`, (SELECT CONCAT(id,'|',title) as goodPercent FROM t_knowledgeshare WHERE reviewstatus=1 and publishdate < tmp_t.publishdate
ORDER BY goodnum DESC, (goodnum/(goodnum+badnum)) DESC ORDER BY publishdate DESC
LIMIT 1) as `next` FROM ( SELECT shr.*, COUNT( cmt.id ) AS cmtCount FROM t_knowledgeshare shr LEFT JOIN t_comment cmt ON shr.id = cmt.articleid WHERE shr.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY shr.id)tmp_t LEFT JOIN t_sys_user usr ON usr.username=tmp_t.author
mapper.update: UPDATE t_knowledgeshare SET pageview = pageview + 1 WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
